name: TensorPower.multilinearMapToDual_apply_tprod
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
M : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : AddCommMonoid M
inst✝ : Module R M
n : Nat
f : Fin n → Module.Dual R M
v : Fin n → M
⊢ Eq (((TensorPower.multilinearMapToDual R M n) f) ((PiTensorProduct.tprod R) v)) (Finset.univ.prod fun i => (f i) (v i))
decl:
variable {R M n} in
@[simp]
theorem multilinearMapToDual_apply_tprod (f : (_ : Fin n) → Module.Dual R M) (v : Fin n → M) :
    multilinearMapToDual R M n f (tprod _ v) = ∏ i, (f i (v i)) := by
  simp [multilinearMapToDual]

name: TensorPower.pairingDual_tprod_tprod
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
M : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : AddCommMonoid M
inst✝ : Module R M
n : Nat
f : Fin n → Module.Dual R M
v : Fin n → M
⊢ Eq (((TensorPower.pairingDual R M n) ((PiTensorProduct.tprod R) f)) ((PiTensorProduct.tprod R) v)) (Finset.univ.prod fun i => (f i) (v i))
decl:
variable {R M n} in
@[simp]
lemma pairingDual_tprod_tprod (f : (_ : Fin n) → Module.Dual R M) (v : Fin n → M) :
    pairingDual R M n (tprod _ f) (tprod _ v) = ∏ i, (f i (v i)) := by
  simp [pairingDual]
